mapper.insert: insert into board_reply ( bno, reply, replyer, replyDate ) values ( #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate())
mapper.update: update board_reply set reply=#{reply}, updateDate=sysdate() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select:
\
select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rn, r.* from board_reply as r, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp where bno=#{bno}) as t where rn > (#{cri.pageNum}-1)*#{cri.amount} and rn <= #{cri.pageNum}*#{cri.amount} order by rn asc;
